pages.title: Vault Burger
pages.text: Vault Burgers are a Vault XP food Item that grants between 0.5 - 3.0% XP for the next required level.
Crafting a $(#033dfc)Vault Burger$().$(br2)Can also be found inside Vaults

pages.title: Oozing Pizza
pages.text: Oozing Pizzas are a Vault XP food Item that grants between 0.3 - 1.0% XP for the next required level.

pages.title: Vault Cookie
pages.text: Vault Cookies are a Vault XP food Item that grants between 1000 - 3500 XP.$(br2)Only works below LVL25

pages.title: Vault Cookie
pages.text: Vault Cookies can be traded for in Vendor Traders & found inside Vaults below LVL25

pages.title: Mystery Stew
pages.text: Mystery Stews can give between 20 - 99% XP for the next level depending on the stew tier that drops
Crafting a $(#033dfc)Oozing Pizza$().$(br2)Can also be found in Vault Chests or crafted from Vendor Traders.
